paragraphs: On Valentine's Day, the romantic movie "The Notebook" will be shown at the Kino Aero cinema in Prague (Biskupcova 31, Praha 3). The film from 2004 is considered one of the best romantic dramas of all time.
The main roles in the movie were played by the young and beautiful Ryan Gosling and Rachel McAdams.
The session starts at 6:40 PM. Tickets can be purchased here. The cost is 160 crowns.

The film is based on the plot of the eponymous biographical novel by Nicholas Sparks, published in 1996 and becoming a bestseller in the very first week of sales. It is a story of a relationship between a young man and a girl from different social classes, living in South Carolina. Noah and Allie spent an unforgettable summer together until they were separated first by their parents and then by World War II.
